text: - My name's Roman Bachmann.
I'm the product manager
of Swisscom's Internal Cloud Platform.

We have formed a strategic
partnership with AWS.

We're really thrilled to
extend our landing zone
to the new AWS Swiss region.
It is of paramount importance to Swisscom

as the Swiss region will
be our primary region.
So what really comes to my mind
if I think about AWS
is the vast ecosystem of individual
AWS services that are interoperable.
I also think about the people
behind those services.
Architects and the Engineers
that provide those AWS services
are really great to work with,
and I really enjoy working
with the AWS Architects and the Engineers
on a daily basis.
It's great to see that your claim
of being customer obsessed
is not just an empty promise,

but this lift and proceed
to such every day.
